title: LOL Esports is so embarrassing
body: Maybe its because I'm (probably) older than a lot of the kids who watch pro-LOL but i find it so damn cringeworthy with it trying to be all professional and official, coaches shaking hands? come on, lol (and exports in general) will never be considered a real sport because of how seriously it takes itself, its just laughable. next thing you know the teams will be singing the national anthem before every match
